EmailTemplate.subject: ISM Weekly Update 24th November, 2011
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Parents, Please find below some interesting information, as we come into the run down to our "Festive Season" for 2011. Also in this issue of our weekly update, is a quiet reminder.....please check it out and respond! Thanks.
Christmas Celebrations and Events: The season is upon us and we would like you to be aware of the following Christmas events that are taking place in the last two weeks of term. (In addition to the Year 1 and Year 4 productions) The Giving TreeWe will be promoting all children/ families to provide a present for our Christmas charity this year. A letter will be coming out at this week giving details from the organising parents of the class reps. Celebrations Friday December 9thClass celebrations will take place on December 9th this year. Class reps are organising events for that morning in Lower and Upper Campus. Please support these morning activities if possible, contact you class rep if you are able to be involved. It will be a non-uniform day in school for all children on that day. Christmas Concert Wednesday December 14th 6pmOur concert will take place on Upper Campus this year. Children from Year 2, 3, 5 and secondary school will be taking part. Limited tickets will be available soon. The music department will inform you when they can be collected. Noon Finish- Friday December 16thJust to remind all families that the last day of school for this term will end at 12 noon. This will allow those travelling to make arrangements for the weekend. Please ensure that you are aware that children will be coming home early on that day. Car License PlatesA quick reminder for parents to please supply Katya Foster with the number plate of cars that deliver or collect your children to or from school. This is for the safety of our children, as our school is on a public street, allowing anyone to park their cars near the school. Please send the number plates to ekaterina.foster@internationalschool.ru Looking forward to seeing many of you at our Christmas Concert. Dino Vikas Head of Admissions The International School of Moscow Tel: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Fax: +7 (499) 922 44 00 Ext.4 www.internationalschool.ru Part of The British Schools Group
